Paytable.paybackBody: For this game, the long-term, theoretically-expected payback {RTP}.
Paytable.overallChances: There is a 1 in {odds} overall chance of winning a prize on each play.

Error.genericErrorText: There has been an internal error. EXIT and relaunch the game.

message_win.TRY:
THANKS FOR PLAYING!
YOU COULD HAVE WON

Game.islandTutorial:
Select 2 squares on the map to start looking for coins.

If you find enough coins to meet the goal, you unlock the island’s treasure and advance to the next island!

You win the treasure of the last island where you meet the coins goal.
Game.page1:
Select 8 of 16 chests in search of treasure.

Find prize amounts to win instantly or collect Bonus symbols to trigger the bonuses!
Game.page3:
Collect 3 {cannonSymbol} to trigger the Cannon Bonus.{line1complete}
Select ships to reveal a cash prize or a multiplier. Reveal Collect to end the bonus.
Game.revealForBonus:
REVEAL A GOLD COIN
TO ENTER THE BONUS GAME
